about.title: About Casa Petanque
about.subtitle: A Story of Passion and Hospitality
about.paragraph1: Casa Petanque is a beautiful brand new house with a spacious garden surrounded by woods. This fully equipped luxury retreat offers the perfect blend of modern amenities and natural beauty, creating an unforgettable vacation experience in Valle de Bravo.
about.paragraph2: With 4 bedrooms, 5.5 bathrooms, and accommodations for 16+ guests, our property features exceptional entertainment including a private hot tub, steam sauna, game room with air hockey and pool tables, ping pong, badminton court, pétanque court, and HDTV with streaming services. The fully fenced private backyard offers a BBQ grill, outdoor kitchen, fire pit, outdoor dining area, and hammocks for ultimate relaxation.
about.paragraph3: Our property offers complete comfort with a fully equipped kitchen (refrigerator, microwave, stove, oven, coffee maker, cooking basics, dishes and silverware), dedicated workspace with WiFi, wood-burning fireplace, washer and free dryer, and all essentials including towels, bed sheets, toiletries, and hangers. A guardian is available 24/7 to assist you, and maid service can be arranged. We welcome pets, allow smoking in designated areas, and accommodate long-term stays of 28+ days with self check-in available.

faqs.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faqs.subtitle: Everything you need to know about your stay

q1.question: What is petanque?
q1.answer: Petanque is a traditional French game similar to boules or bocce. Players throw metal balls as close as possible to a small wooden ball called a cochonnet. Our professional court is perfect for both beginners and experienced players.

q2.question: How many people can stay at Casa Petanque?
q2.answer: Casa Petanque comfortably accommodates 16+ guests with 4 bedrooms (8 beds) and 5.5 bathrooms. Perfect for large families or group gatherings.

q3.question: What amenities are included?
q3.answer: The house features a fully equipped kitchen with all appliances and cooking basics, Wi-Fi, dedicated workspace, HDTV with Netflix/Prime/Hulu, DVD player, jacuzzi, steam sauna, game room with air hockey and pool tables, ping pong, badminton court, petanque court, board games, wood-burning fireplace, washer/dryer, private garden with BBQ grill and outdoor kitchen, fire pit, outdoor dining area, hammocks, parking for 8 cars, and 24/7 on-site staff. All essentials provided including linens, towels, toiletries, and kitchen basics.

q4.question: Is the property suitable for families and pets?
q4.answer: Yes! Casa Petanque is family-friendly with cribs, fireplace guards, and a fully fenced private backyard. Pets are welcome! We also allow smoking in designated areas and offer long-term stays of 28+ days. Self check-in is available with 24/7 building staff to assist you.

q5.question: Where is Casa Petanque located?
q5.answer: Casa Petanque is located in Avándaro, Valle de Bravo, Estado de México. This charming lakeside town is about 2 hours from Mexico City, offering a perfect escape with beautiful lake views, mountain scenery, and year-round pleasant weather.

q6.question: What's not included?
q6.answer: The property does not have air conditioning (though heating is available) and there are no exterior security cameras on the property. However, the mild Valle de Bravo climate rarely requires AC, and the house has heating for cooler evenings.

q7.question: What's provided in the bedrooms and bathrooms?
q7.answer: All bedrooms include bed linens, room-darkening shades, hangers, and an iron. Bathrooms are stocked with hair dryers, shampoo, hot water, towels, soap, and toilet paper. We also provide cribs for families with babies and have fireplace guards for child safety.

q8.question: Can I work remotely from the property?
q8.answer: Absolutely! The house features high-speed WiFi throughout and a dedicated workspace in a private room with a door, perfect for video calls and focused work. The peaceful garden setting provides an inspiring environment for remote work.
